game.name: Gorilla Attack 2: Rampage
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Your favorite gorilla (kind of) is back! Smash a massive new city, take on unique challenges, and interact with a fully destructible world. Team up with friends or let them join your chaotic VR adventure!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Your favorite gorilla (kind of) is back! Smash a massive new city, take on unique challenges, and interact with a fully destructible world. Team up with friends or let them join your chaotic VR adventure!
